Summary: Saw an Orange fire orb slowly moving in the sky at 59th and country gables
divs: Sighting DetailsI was jogging around 9pm on the 4th of july close by country gables and 59th ave at the ymca, i was jogging around the parking lot, When i looked up and saw an orange type fire orb in the sky flying very slowly i assumed it was some new firework but of course that sounds dumb anyways after about 10 min it was headed towards my rea not exactly but it was coming in my direction and i could see it clearly i ran to the left of the ymca and preceeded to run back hom i turned around and could still see it clearly but it started to sort of fizzle out it's fire slowly stopped glowing and just went away. I still have no idea what it was.
trends: There have been 52 other sightings in Glendale
There were no other sightings in Glendale on or around July 4th 2012
